name: DDDOGE
description:
DDDOGE is a short prototype of the rhythm game in which you have to chase a dog in a disco. To move around the playing field, press and hold the keys to create chains of letters. Pick up the tiles and push the partygoers out of the way. 

We recommend you turn off Sticky Keys feature for comfortable playing.

Some keyboards do not allow you to press multiple keys at the same time, even if you turn off this feature. We're sorry for the inconvenience :(
